item.title: Spain begins national mourning for train crash victims as death toll rises
item.description: The death toll from the train crash in southern Spain rose to 41 after the body of another passenger was recovered from one of the carriages.

item.title: 1/19: The Takeout with Major Garrett
item.description: Minneapolis ICE protests continue in face of Trump's Insurrection Act threat; Indiana and Miami students reflect on lead-up to football championship.

item.title: Trump U-turns on U.K.-Chagos Islands deal, links it to bid for Greenland
item.description: Trump says the U.K. decision to hand a strategic island to Mauritius, which he previously supported, was stupid, and justification for his attempt to ...

item.title: After 4 shark attacks, beachgoers urged to "just go to a local pool"
item.description: Authorities warned that recent rainfall has left the water off area beaches murky, which increased the risk of bull shark attacks.

item.title: Pardoned Jan. 6 rioter to face criminal trial for child molestation
item.description: Andrew Johnson is the latest in a series of pardoned Jan. 6 riot defendants to face new criminal charges.
